channel.title: Chromedp on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Chromedp on SpiderSoft

item.title: How to scrape page source with Go and chromedp
item.description: It’s clear what we are trying to achieve, so let’s consider the requirements. Firstly, we need a tool to render web pages since JavaScript is commonly used nowadays. Secondly, we require an API to communicate with the headless browser. Lastly, saving the result can be challenging as browsers are designed to interact with rendered results rather than directly with the source code. Headless browser So we are looking for a headless browser.
